CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec
M and C often mumble or speak in low voices

u.a: C is involved in house; M may be referring to a bed
C reaches in house and pulls out toys
M pulls something out of house
C moves a toy nearer to himself
C appears to be trying to fit dog in bed
M points at three places in house as she speaks
C puts bed in a room
C tries to open door of garage
M makes motion of lifting garage door with her hand
C drives car out of garage and around table
M looks around house as if searching for something
C has pile of books; looked at M for direction
C just looks at pile of books
M opens book; M turns a few pages
M points in book and shows to C
M points at part of the picture
C picks up Care_Bear feelings book
C opens book and stares at it
M shakes her finger at the page; turns to next page
M points at top of picture
M points near bottom of page
<bef> M turns page then M points
M points to parts of picture as she speaks
